name: AsyncWebServer_ESP32_W6100
description: Asynchronous HTTP and WebSocket Server Library for (ESP32 + LwIP W6100). Now supporting using CString to save heap to send very large data and with examples to demo how to use beginChunkedResponse() to send large html in chunks. To install AsyncTCP manually for Arduino IDE
keywords: http, async, async-webserver, async-websocket, websocket, webserver, esp32, W6100, lwip, lwip-ethernet, lwip-w6100, ethernet
